_sText:
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2RhNKbSyEBM

**What is this?**
This is a simple minigames map in which players are spawned on a number of blocks. After 3 seconds, the blocks will start breaking when the player runs over them. Below the stage is deadly lava, so watch out! The overall goal is to be the last player alive.

**Things to note**
Blocks break 0.5 seconds after being touched, meaning speed will have to be accounted. Player's sprinting speed in stamina works perfectly fine. 

**Hey, the lava doesn't kill the player in the video!**
That's my dev server being weird, I double-checked on singleplayer to make sure I hadn't fucked the trigger_hurt and it was okay, but let me know if there's any issues!
